forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 24. South wind around 10 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Rain showers after 1pm. Cloudy, with a high near 44. South wind 10 to 15 mph, with gusts as high as 26 mph. Chance of precipitation is 90%. New rainfall amounts less than a tenth of an inch possible.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the night, Boston rests under a canopy of mostly cloudy skies, where the chill serves as a reminder that winter holds tight to its grip. With temperatures dipping to a brisk 24 degrees, the gentle breath of a south wind brushes against the cheeks, delivering whispers of incoming rainfall that is poised to blanket the city by afternoon. As dawn approaches, the atmosphere hangs heavy with anticipation, hinting at the grayness that will soon unfurl over the landscape.

As you step into the daylight, prepare for a day of overcast skies, where rain showers will emerge post-lunch, creating a sense of melancholy that intertwines with the vivid pulse of the city. The high will nudge towards a mild 44, yet it may feel cooler with gusts reaching 26 mph. Dressing warmly in layers, perhaps donning a woolen scarf should keep the brisk breeze at bay, while a waterproof jacket will safeguard against the impending dampness. Ideal activities might include seeking warmth in one of the many inviting cafes that dot the streets, indulging in a comforting cup of coffee, or leisurely browsing through tucked-away bookstores. As the rain begins to fall, the vibrant energy of Boston transforms, revealing a different charm — one that beckons you to wander beneath awnings, where the scent of rain mingles with the rich aroma of baked goods wafting from nearby bakeries.
